Summaries: 6 verse in 1 section. The Surah tells us that Satan is always against the human beings and he puts wrong suggestions in their minds. We should seek Allah’s protection from Satan and his whisperings. This is a very appropriate ending for the Book of Allah. The Book of God is to provide protection from all evil and success under the guidance of Allah.

Translations.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind
from the evil of the lurking whisperer—
who whispers into the hearts of humankind—
